義親: (ぎしん) - parent according to law or convention but not biology; inlaws
義訓: (ぎくん) - reading of a kanji by meaning

羹に懲りて膾を吹く: (あつものにこりてなますをふく) - a burnt child dreads the fire; once bitten twice shy; to become over cautious from a bad experience

羽振りが良い: (はぶりがよい) - influential; powerful; popular; prosperous (when modifying a noun); doing well
